TopicTitle: How many Kerbals can fit in one Habitation Module?

Articles.Content:
I have a basic Space Station design; Solar Panels, RCS and Rocket Fuel, Ship Docking Ports. and two Lander Cans and two Habitation Modules.

I'd like to know how many Kerbals can fit in just one of my two Habitation Modules. It'll let me know how many rockets I need to send to Duna, which is where my station is. It currently has two Kerbals in.
